item.title: Abbas, Nazrul, Rizvi, 7 others made advisers to prime minister
item.description: The government has appointed 10 individuals as advisers to Prime Minister Tarique Rahman under Rule 3(b) of the Rules of Business, 1996, according to news portals. Among them, five advisers have been granted the status of minister, and the rest of them have been granted the status of state ministe

item.title: Former football captain Aminul appointed state minister for sports
item.description: Former national football team captain Aminul Haque has been appointed as the State Minister for the Ministry of Youth and Sports under the technocrat quota. Aminul, a leader of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP), has been active in politics following his retirement from professional sports. H

item.title: Cricket legends urge immediate medical care for Imran Khan
item.description: A group of former international cricket captains has urged Pakistan’s government to provide “immediate and adequate medical attention” to jailed former prime minister and cricket legend Imran Khan, citing concerns over his deteriorating health in custody. In a letter sent to Prim

item.title: Southeast Bank wins J.P. Morgan’s Award
item.description: Southeast Bank PLC wins “The 2025 U.S. Dollar Clearing Elite Quality Recognition Award for Outstanding Achievement of Best-in-Class” of J.P. Morgan Chase Bank, N.A., the largest bank in the United States. The ceremony was graced by the Chairman of Southeast Bank PLC., Mr. M. A. Kashem

item.title: Midland Bank inaugurated its relocated Bheramara Branch
item.description: Midland Bank PLC (MDB) formally inaugurated its relocated Bheramara Branch at Babor Ali Super Market, Holding No. 271-01 & 02, Bheramara -Pragpur Highway Road, Word No. 06, Bheramara Pouroshava on February 16, 2026. Md. Ahsan-uz Zaman, Managing Director & CEO of the Bank inaugurated the Branch as

item.title: Pubali Bank inaugurates 518th Branch at Iswarganj in Mymeningh
item.description: Pubali Bank PLC has inaugurated its 518th branch at Iswarganj, Mymeningh recently with a view to providing modern banking services, according to a press release. Md. Shahnewaz Khan, Deputy Managing Director of Pubali Bank PLC., formally inaugurated the branch as the Chief Guest. Md. Faizul Hoque S

item.title: Islami Bank remittance clients to get 20 Motorcycles
item.description: Islami Bank Bangladesh PLC will provide a motorcycle through digital raffle draw on every banking day (Sun-Thursday) for sending cash remittance through Ria Money Transfer. Remittance recipients will also get a key ring as a common gift. This offer will continue from 19 February to 18 March, 2026

item.title: NCC Bank signs agreement with Unisoft Systems Limited on digital loan management system
item.description: NCC Bank has formally launched its Digital Loan Management System (DLMS) across all branches, marking a significant milestone in the Bank’s ongoing digital transformation journey. According to a press release, the state-of-the-art solution has been designed and implemented by Unisoft Systems

item.title: Uzzal Hossain appointed PM’s Protocol Officer-1
item.description: Md. Uzzal Hossain, Senior Assistant Secretary of the Ministry of Public Administration, has been appointed on deputation as Protocol Officer-1 to the Prime Minister’s office. According to a notification issued by the Ministry of Public Administration, his service has been placed at the Prime

item.title: Maldivian President meets PM Tarique Rahman
item.description: Maldivian President Dr Mohamed Muizzu met newly elected Prime Minister Tarique Rahman at his Sangsad Bhaban office in Dhaka after he took the oath of office as the 11th Prime Minister of Bangladesh on Tuesday afternoon. Prime Minister's daughter Zaima Rahman, new minister Dr Khalilur Rahman and of

item.title: Crowne Plaza Dhaka Airport inaugurated
item.description: Crowne Plaza Dhaka Airport has officially opened its doors at Centrepoint, marking a significant milestone in Bangladesh’s hospitality landscape. The inauguration ceremony was held in the presence of distinguished guests, including advisors and directors of United Group, alongside representa

item.title: Who holds which portfolios in Tarique’s cabinet
item.description: After leading his party to a landslide, Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) chief Tarique Rahman has assembled a 50-member cabinet combining a striking number of new faces alongside seasoned leaders. The new government, sworn in on Tuesday at the South Plaza of parliament, consists of 25 ministers
